title: league of legends client wont show champs
body:
I usally play on the new client but I wanted to play one for all, so I change to the old one. When I got back on the new client and joina a blind pick it wouldent show the champs, I tried clicking around, tabing down then up the client but nothing worked and I got kcik because I dident select a champion. Got a 5min ban, tried to join a game again and it wouldet show the champions again and I got a 15min ban
 {{item:3070}} {{item:2050}}

replies.body:
It sounds like there may be a corruption or simply missing assets from your installation. I'd recommend [running a repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq5) of your game files to ensure all those assets are there.

I recommend testing any changes in a *custom match* to prevent any further penalties.
